verses.verse: There was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> that was in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham.<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H3381>"Don't<s%> go down into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H7931>Live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> I will tell you <S%H559>about.<s%>

<S%H1481>Live<s%> in this <S%H776>land,<s%> and I will be with <S%H1288>you,<s%> and will bless <S%H2233>you.<s%> For to you, and to your seed, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>lands,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

I <S%H7235>will<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>lands.<s%> In your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%>

<S%H6118>because<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>requirements,<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and my <S%H8451>laws.<s%>"
<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him about his <S%H802>wife.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "She is my <S%H269>sister,<s%>" for he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> "My <S%H802>wife,<s%>" <S%H582>lest,<s%> he thought, "the men of the <S%H4725>place<s%> might <S%H2026>kill<s%> me for <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> because she is <S%H2896>beautiful<s%> to look <S%H4758>at.<s%>"

It <S%H748>happened,<s%> when he had been there a long <S%H3117>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> looked <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> <S%H3327>and,<s%> behold, Isaac was <S%H6711>caressing<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Behold,<s%> surely she is your <S%H802>wife.<s%> Why did you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H269><s%> 'She is my sister?'" <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Because I said, <S%H4191><s%> 'Lest I die because of her.'"

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is this you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H259>us?<s%> One of the <S%H5971>people<s%> might <S%H4592>easily<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> with your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and you would have <S%H935>brought<s%> guilt on <S%H817>us!<s%>"

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "He who <S%H5060>touches<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> or his <S%H802>wife<s%> will <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2232>sowed<s%> in that <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4672>reaped<s%> in the same <S%H8141>year<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> times what he <S%H3068>planted.<s%> Yahweh blessed <S%H1288>him.<s%>
The <S%H376>man<s%> grew <S%H1431>great,<s%> and <S%H1432>grew<s%> <S%H3212>more<s%> and <S%H1980>more<s%> until he <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%>

He had <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5657>household.<s%> The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> envied <S%H7065>him.<s%>

Now all the <S%H875>wells<s%> which his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> had <S%H2658>dug<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H6083>earth.<s%>
<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> from <S%H3966>us,<s%> for you are much mightier than <S%H6105>we.<s%>"
<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> from <S%H2583>there,<s%> encamped in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> which they had <S%H2658>dug<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%> For the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped<s%> them <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham.<s%> He <S%H7121>called<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> after the <S%H8034>names<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had called <S%H7121>them.<s%>
<S%H3327>Isaac<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> there a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>springing<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> <S%H7378>argued<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>'s <S%H7462>herdsmen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H4325>water<s%> is <S%H7121>ours.<s%>" He called the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H6230>Esek,<s%> because they contended with <S%H6229>him.<s%>
They <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well,<s%> and they <S%H7378>argued<s%> over <S%H7121>that,<s%> also. He called <S%H8034>its<s%> name <S%H7856>Sitnah.<s%>

He <S%H6275>left<s%> that <S%H2658>place,<s%> and dug <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well.<s%> They <S%H7378>didn't<s%> argue over that <S%H7121>one.<s%> He called <S%H8034>it<s%> <S%H7344>Rehoboth.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "For <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has made <S%H7337>room<s%> for <S%H6509>us,<s%> and we will be fruitful in the <S%H776>land.<s%>"
He went <S%H5927>up<s%> from there to <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him the same <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, for I am <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1288>you,<s%> and will bless <S%H7235>you,<s%> and multiply your <S%H2233>seed<s%> for my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s sake."

He <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7121>there,<s%> and called on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H3327>there.<s%> There Isaac's <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to him from <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> and <S%H276>Ahuzzath<s%> his <S%H4828>friend,<s%> and <S%H6369>Phicol<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army.<s%>
<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4069>them,<s%> "Why have you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8130>me,<s%> since you hate <S%H7971>me,<s%> and have sent me away from you?"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7200>plainly<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H559>you.<s%> We said, <S%H423><s%> 'Let there now be an oath <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H996>us,<s%> even between us and <S%H3772>you,<s%> and let us make a covenant with <S%H1285>you,<s%>

that you will <S%H6213>do<s%> us no <S%H7451>harm,<s%> as we have not <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> and as we have done to you nothing <S%H7535>but<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and have sent you <S%H7971>away<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>' You are <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
He <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and they <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

They rose up some <S%H7925>time<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another.<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

It happened the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H182>concerning<s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> which they had <S%H2658>dug,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4672>him,<s%> "We have found <S%H4325>water.<s%>"
He <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H7656>Shibah.<s%> Therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> as <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3067>Judith,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite.<s%>
They <S%H4786>grieved<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>'s and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H7307>spirits.<s%>
